Method Detail

act

public void act()
Act - do whatever the date wants to do. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the environment.

Overrides:
act in class ClockMenu

decrementDate

public void decrementDate()
Parameters:
: - (pre) A date object already exists
: - (post) The date will have been moved back by one day and the date object's will be updated
